spirit:field.spirit:name: major
spirit:field.spirit:description: Major version

spirit:field.spirit:name: minor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minor version

spirit:field.spirit:name: patch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Patch version

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_rx_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enables the datapath to receive packets

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_tx_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enables the datapath to transmit packets

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_rx_ready
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates the datapath is ready for transmission

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_tx_ready
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates the datapath is ready for reception

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: link
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: This register group contains channel based link management controls and status information.

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: control0
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: This register group contains channel based link management controls and status information.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_idl_en_min
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of idle packets that must be received before starting to count the locally transmitted ts1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_idl_min
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of idle packets which must be transmitted before moving to the u0 state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_idl_min
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets minimum number of idle packets which must be received before moving to the u0 state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_ts1_en_min
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of ts1 packets that must be received before starting to count the locally transmitted ts1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_ts1_min
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of ts1 packets which must be transmitted before moving to the polling_idle state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_ts1_min
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets minimum number of ts1 packets which must be received before moving to the polling_idle state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_idl_en_max_lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of idle packets that must be received before starting to count the locally transmitted ts2.

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_idl_max_lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of idle packets which must be transmitted before moving to the u0 state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_idl_max_lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets minimum number of idle packets which must be received before moving to the u0 state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_ts2_en_max_lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of ts2 packets that must be received before starting to count the locally transmitted ts1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_ts2_max_lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets the minimum number of ts2 packets which must be transmitted before moving to the rec_idle state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_ts2_max_lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Sets minimum number of ts2 packets which must be received before moving to the rec_idle state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This timer determine the rate at which ts1 packets are transmitted during polling_active (default approximately 3us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This timer determine the rate at which idle packets are transmitted during polling_idle (default approximately 3us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: When in polling_ilde this timer determine how long to wait before re-starting the polling_active state. (default approximately 1ms)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This timer determine the rate at which ts2 packets are transmitted during rec_active. (default approximately 0.25us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This timer determine the rate at which idle packets are transmitted during rec_idle (default approximately 0.25us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: When in rec_ilde this timer determine how long to wait before declaring a recovery failure and declaring the port in-active. (default approximately 1ms)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: When operating in U0 this timer defines the rate at which the system transmits keep alive packets (note these are only done in absence of transmitting data). (default approximately 10us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This timer sets the maximum time limit to wait for a response to be received from the remote port to a retry-able MCUP (default approximately 100us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This sets the credit timeout.not implemented yet. (default approximately 100us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This timer sets the limit on how long to wait without seeing received traffic (link ups/data etc) from the remote end. (default approximately 500us)

spirit:field.spirit:name: lmt
spirit:field.spirit:description: This timer sets the rate at which the latency packet sequence is transmitted. Results are stored in the channel associated with the test. (default approximately 100us)

spirit:register.spirit:name: cfg
spirit:register.spirit:description: General configuration settings for the link management logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: active_channels
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates how many channels are used in this instance of the MCA.

spirit:field.spirit:name: stats_chid_en
spirit:field.spirit:description:
This field is represents the bit vector which selects the channel(s) which participate in the statistics collection.
Bit X 1 - Include channel in statistics collection 0 - Exclude channel from statistics collection

spirit:field.spirit:name: bw_pkt_type
spirit:field.spirit:description: Defines the packet types which bandwidth measurements are taken measured at the egress of the MCA. 0 - all packet types 1 - lgood 2 - lcrd 3 - retriable mcup 4 - non-retriable mcup

spirit:register.spirit:name: bw_sample_timer
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register defines the sample period all bandwidth monitors use to calculate the average bandwidth. The clock reference is the core clock.

spirit:field.spirit:name: cnt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Defines the periodicity of the bandwidth sample clock

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: pfifo
spirit:register.spirit:description: Packet FIFO level. This is fixed at 16 elements (16 * 8= 128 bytes)

spirit:register.spirit:name: nfifo
spirit:register.spirit:description: Notification FIFO level. This represents the number of MCUPS in the egress FIFO

spirit:register.spirit:name: cmd_fifo_dcount
spirit:register.spirit:description: This is the common TX Command FIFO level.All channels send link commands through this FIFO

spirit:register.spirit:name: data_pkt_nrtry
spirit:register.spirit:description: This represents the number of non-retriable data-packets are being sent

spirit:register.spirit:name: data_pkt_rtry
spirit:register.spirit:description: This is the number of retriable packets which have been transmitted

spirit:register.spirit:name: idle
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number if idle packets transmitted. These should be relatively low so this counter is small.

spirit:register.spirit:name: ts2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number if ts2 packets transmitted. These should be relatively low so this counter is small.

spirit:register.spirit:name: ts1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number if ts1 packets transmitted. These should be relatively low so this counter is small.

spirit:register.spirit:name: lbad
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of LBAD packets transmitted.

spirit:register.spirit:name: lrtry
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of retry requests sent to the remote end

spirit:register.spirit:name: lcrd
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of credit packets transmitted.

spirit:register.spirit:name: lgood
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of LGOOD packets transmitted.

spirit:register.spirit:name: plu
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of keep alive packets transmitted

spirit:register.spirit:name: bandwidth
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register reports the high level watermark of the egress bandwidth. *NOTE: this depends on the configuration which packets types are measured

spirit:field.spirit:name: stats_chid_en
spirit:field.spirit:description:
This field is represents the bit vector which selects the channel(s) which participate in the statistics collection.
Bit X 1 - Include channel in statistics collection 0 - Exclude channel from statistics collection

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_cmd_fifo_flc
spirit:register.spirit:description:
The RX command flow control sets the hysteresis points which enable or disable flow control globally on the data-path.
The RX command FIFO contains all responses generated from the RX link management logic. This is a relatively large FIFO and is designed to hold more data than the TX channel FIFO's.
Commands in this FIFO are critical and must not be lost. When the FIFO reaches its upper limit it will prevent transmission of data payloads over the link allowing a bias to the TX command FIFO's to drain, and henceforth allowing the RX command FIFO to drain.

spirit:field.spirit:name: hi
spirit:field.spirit:description: When the FIFO reaches this limit the system will enter flow control.

spirit:field.spirit:name: lo
spirit:field.spirit:description: When the FIFO threshold reaches this threshold flow control will be disabled and normal operation can occur.

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats0
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the Statistic Registers and their configuration for the Write Engine

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: cmd_fifo_dcount
spirit:register.spirit:description: This is the common RX Command FIFO level.All channels receive link commands through this FIFO

spirit:register.spirit:name: data_pkt_nrtry
spirit:register.spirit:description: This represents the number of non-retriable data-packets received

spirit:register.spirit:name: data_pkt_rtry
spirit:register.spirit:description: This is the number of retriable packets which have been received

spirit:register.spirit:name: idle
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of idle packets received. These should be relatively low so this counter is small.

spirit:register.spirit:name: ts2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of ts2 packets received. These should be relatively low so this counter is small.

spirit:register.spirit:name: ts1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of ts1 packets received. These should be relatively low so this counter is small.

spirit:register.spirit:name: lbad
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of LBAD packets received.

spirit:register.spirit:name: lrtry
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of retry requests sent to the remote end

spirit:register.spirit:name: lcrd
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of credit packets received.

spirit:register.spirit:name: lgood
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of LGOOD packets transmitted.

spirit:register.spirit:name: plu
spirit:register.spirit:description: Number of keep alive packets received

spirit:register.spirit:name: rx_cmd_fifo_flc
spirit:register.spirit:description: Counts the number of clock cycles the RX command FIFO flow control state has been active

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have been triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the active state of interrupt sources

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_dp_grd_sop_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_dp_grd_eop_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_dp_grd_max_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: rx_lnk_cmd_fifo_full_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: (Active High)-rising edge-Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_lnk_cmd_fifo_full_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: (Active High)-rising edge-Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_grd_sop_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_grd_eop_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_grd_max_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_fifo_drp_pkt_wr
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_fifo_drp_pkt_rd
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_fifo_pkt_sop_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_fifo_pkt_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: (Active High)-rising edge-Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_fifo_full_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: (Active High)-rising edge-Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_fifo_pkt_max_sz_err
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: tx_dp_fifo_drp_pkt
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pulse. Critical Error

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_ready
spirit:field.spirit:description: (Active-High), rising and falling edge

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_rx_ready
spirit:field.spirit:description: (Active-High), rising and falling edge

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_tx_ready
spirit:field.spirit:description: (Active-High), rising and falling edge

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
